Blog.post: I went to Dillards and as i was filling the application on eof the questions was are you over the age of 18 cause those r the only people we hire, or something like that. So yea im still looking for ajob, Amanda says ill get one at joehmans as soon as they change managers so im waiting.

Yesterday dillards finally called. Like 2 hrs after i filled something out online. The weird thing is what i filled out has almost no imformation about me. They told me to go today at liike 1pm and fill out an application and then page this woman called dora. So thats what im doing!! haha. Then i have no idea what im doing.... c ya!

Just Got off the phone with Justin. The end of yet another day. I went to Xaviers sisters job so xavier could drop of her car. We saw a bunch of ducks there, it was kool. After that we went to mcdonalds adn then to hollywood then we went to pick JUSTIN up. Then we went back to hollywood and waited for allen and then carmen. After that we went yet again to mc donalds. Justin bought me some nuggets and he got a cheeseburger. After that me and justin went back to hollywood but the rest of the people went to the movies!! :D . Had a great day !!!!!! Love YAll!! :D

Ok, so today i wake up at 9:10 so i would be ready for art class at 10:00. I go to tinas house for the class and the other 2 students are there but no sign of tina, great, aniways we waited for an hour and no sign of tina. We called her call and her house number and no answere so today i had no art class. Just waistes sleep time and 1 hour waiting for her but o well :P :D aniways!!! im hoping te day will ge tbetter now. Im prolly gona go to gym at 1:00 or so and then eat and well c what happens after that. C YA!
Here are the pics i took today!!! I will take more soon and now i can upload em fast cause i use hello :P so yea whooo!! haha aniways c ya

We hung out for a wile and talked and stuff. AFter that i went to hollywood and saw bunches of people, Xavier, Carmen, Jordan, Allen, Victor, Jeremy and of course JUSTIN.
